channel.title: Home
channel.description: Avneesh Chaudhary (he/him) is a Computer Engineer living in Kitchener-Waterloo. He's previously built things at TBS, PSPC, and Transport Canada.

item.title: Building a Drone: Practical Integration
item.description: Key lessons from my experience building a semi-autonomous drone.

item.title: Web-based Speech to Text Application
item.description: As a web-based platform, it enables seamless transcription of spoken words into text for multilingual users
